title: Kachumber (Indian cucumber, radish and tomato salad)
ingredients: ['1 mooli (daikon radish), peeled and sliced into strips', '1 cucumber, sliced into strips', '1 tomato, seeded and sliced into strips', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 lemon, juiced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', 'freshly chopped coriander leaves, to serve']
